summary: Frontend-only SEO improvements for Kelani Cosmetics static pages: add public sitemap.xml and robots.txt, and implement Spanish/local SEO meta tags (including OG/Twitter/canonical/robots) for homepage, contact, and privacy pages with Valencia and Málaga store details; exclude dynamic category/product pages.
architectural_notes: Frontend-only change: implement head meta tags using React Helmet (or equivalent) per page component; override conflicting tags; ensure proper accents/encoding.
Do not remove, modify, or overwrite the existing :root CSS custom properties block in index.css; only append new styles below it.
Scope limitation: only static pages (/, /contacto, /privacy); exclude dynamic categories/products and no dynamic sitemap generation.

existing_features.title: Create a static sitemap at `frontend/public/sitemap.xml` with exactly the XML content provided by the user, and ensure it is served publicly at `https://kelanicosmetics.es/sitemap.xml` (no dynamic URL generation for categories or products).
Create a static robots file at `frontend/public/robots.txt` with exactly the content provided by the user, including the sitemap reference to `https://kelanicosmetics.es/sitemap.xml`.

Implement a frontend-only mechanism (React Helmet or an equivalent approach) to set and override per-route `<head>` tags for the static public pages: homepage (`/`), contact page (`/contacto`), and privacy policy page (`/privacy`), without changing page behavior.

Update the homepage (`frontend/src/pages/public/HomePage.tsx`) to set exactly the provided Spanish SEO tags (title, description, keywords, robots, canonical, Open Graph, Twitter) with canonical URL `https://kelanicosmetics.es/` and local SEO wording for Valencia/València and Málaga, including accents and special characters exactly as specified.

Update the contact page (`frontend/src/pages/public/ContactoPage.tsx`) to set exactly the provided Spanish SEO tags (title, description, keywords, robots, canonical, Open Graph), including the store addresses and local details (neighborhoods and postal codes) exactly as specified.

Update the privacy policy page (`frontend/src/pages/public/PrivacyPage.tsx`) to set exactly the provided Spanish SEO tags (title, description, keywords, robots, canonical, Open Graph), and ensure the page remains `noindex, follow`. Remove/replace any existing ad-hoc title/description side effects that conflict with these tags.

Ensure SEO implementation uses the production domain in all canonical and OG URL tags (`https://kelanicosmetics.es`), keeps all meta tag text in Spanish, and correctly handles character encoding for accents (e.g., `València`).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add static sitemap.xml and robots.txt in /public, plus Spanish/local SEO meta tags (Helmet or equivalent) for homepage, contacto, and privacy pages on kelanicosmetics.es; privacy must remain noindex; include exact Valencia/Málaga address details; no dynamic URLs.

Do not remove, modify, or overwrite the `:root` CSS custom properties block in `frontend/src/index.css`; if any styling changes are needed for SEO implementation (not expected), append new CSS only below the existing `:root` block without altering its variable names, values, or structure.
